Actions.Name: Ancient Geo
Effects: Attack target releases a medium blast explosion centered on them, dealing 2 damage to all characters within.
If the attack target is bloody or dazed, they explode again, repeating this effect.

Actions.Name: Great Stone Toss
Actions.Effects: A foe in range takes 2 damage and is shoved 1, then create a height 1 boulder object next to them.

Actions.Name: Earthforce
Actions.Description: An adjacent object is shoved 3. Characters in its path are shoved 1 to either side and become slashed.

Actions.Name: Hurl Self
Actions.Description: The [name] sacrifices 25% of its maximum hp, hurling part of itself at a foe. A foe in range 5 must save or take 3[D]+[fray], be shoved 3, and become stunned. On a successful save, they are shoved 1, slashed, and take [D]+[fray]. Then, create a height 1 boulder object adjacent to that foe. If the hob is at 1 hp, it defeats itself with this move.
